text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Private Security (Licensing and

title: Provisions) Act 2011 (No. 23 of 2011) of the Private Security Services Act
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on the 8th day of June 2022.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on the 8th day of June 2022.
